text: Frito-Lay North America is an American company connected under PepsiCo, Inc. The company creates potato chips, corn chips and other snack foods. It was founded around 1965. Its headquarters is in Plano, TX. == References == Category:1961 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Texas Category:American food companies Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Plano, Texas
title: Frito-Lay
